what: Wrap a flextable for use with patchwork — wrap_flextable
title: Wrap a flextable for use with patchwork — wrap_flextable
text: function wraps flextable patchwork-compliant patch, similar patchwork::wrap_table() gt tables. allows flextable objects combined ggplot2 plots patchwork layout, optional alignment table headers body plot panel areas. Note experimental may change future.

title: Wrap a flextable for use with patchwork — wrap_flextable
code: wrap_flextable(   x,   panel = c("body", "full", "rows", "cols"),   space = c("free", "free_x", "free_y", "fixed"),   n_row_headers = 0L )

title: Wrap a flextable for use with patchwork — wrap_flextable
text: x flextable object. panel portion table aligned panel region? "body" means header footer placed outside panel region. "full" means whole table placed inside panel region. "rows" keeps rows inside panel otherwise equivalent "body". "cols" places columns within panel region keeps column headers top. space dimension table influence final composition? "fixed" means table width height set dimensions area occupies. "free" means table dimensions influence sizing. "free_x" "free_y" allow freeing either direction. n_row_headers Number leading columns treat row headers. columns placed outside panel region participate alignment plot axes.

title: Wrap a flextable for use with patchwork — wrap_flextable
text: patchwork-compliant object can combined ggplot2 plots using +, |, / operators.

title: Wrap a flextable for use with patchwork — wrap_flextable
code: # \donttest{ library(gdtools) register_liberationsans() #> [1] TRUE set_flextable_defaults(   font.family = "Liberation Sans",   font.size = 7,   padding = 4,   big.mark = "" )  if (require("patchwork") && require("ggplot2")) {   ft <- flextable(head(iris))   ft <- autofit(ft)   p <- ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width)) +     geom_point()    tf <- tempfile(fileext = ".png")   ragg::agg_png(     filename = tf, width = 8,     height = 7, units = "in", res = 150   )   # Place side by side   print(p | wrap_flextable(ft))   dev.off()    tf <- tempfile(fileext = ".png")   ragg::agg_png(     filename = tf, width = 8,     height = 7, units = "in", res = 150   )   # Stack vertically   print(p / wrap_flextable(ft))   dev.off()    tf <- tempfile(fileext = ".png")   ragg::agg_png(     filename = tf, width = 8,     height = 7, units = "in", res = 150   )   # Use + operator (also works directly: p + ft)   print(p + wrap_flextable(ft))   dev.off()    # does not work perfectly if below the boxplot   p <- ggplot(diamonds, aes(color, x)) +     geom_boxplot(position = position_dodge(width = 1))    ft <- summarizor(diamonds[c("color", "cut", "carat")], by = c("color"))   ft <- as_flextable(       ft,       sep_w = 0.0,       spread_first_col = TRUE     )   ft <- delete_part(ft, "header")    ptch <- p / wrap_flextable(     x = ft,     panel = "body",     space = "fixed",     n_row_headers = 1   )    tf <- tempfile(fileext = ".png")   ragg::agg_png(     filename = tf, width = 8,     height = 7, units = "in", res = 150   )   print(ptch)   dev.off()      # This one works well - horizontally   p <- ggplot(diamonds) +     geom_bar(aes(y = cut)) +     scale_y_discrete(name = NULL, guide = "none")    cts <- data.frame(     cut = ordered(       c("Fair", "Good", "Very Good", "Premium", "Ideal"),       levels = c("Fair", "Good", "Very Good", "Premium", "Ideal")     ),     n = c(1610L, 4906L, 12082L, 13791L, 21551L)   )    ft_tab <- flextable(cts)   ft_tab <- autofit(ft_tab)    ptch <- wrap_flextable(ft_tab, space = "fixed") + p    tf <- tempfile(fileext = ".png")   ragg::agg_png(     filename = tf, width = 6,     height = 2, units = "in", res = 150   )   print(ptch)   dev.off()   init_flextable_defaults() } #> Loading required package: patchwork # }

title: flextable 0.9.11
text: new function wrap_flextable() enables integration ‘patchwork’ layouts. Flextable objects can combined ‘ggplot2’ plots using +, |, / operators. Table headers footers aligned plot panel areas. panel argument controls alignment ("body", "full", "rows", "cols") space argument controls sizing ("free", "fixed", "free_x", "free_y"). support strikethrough formatting fp_text_default(). new function as_strike() apply strikethrough formatting text chunks. new function compact_summary() create compact summary data.frame can transformed flextable as_flextable(). summarizor(): using overall_label multiple columns, overall level now added grouping column (last one). produces margins every nesting level, including grand total. footnote() gains symbol_sep argument insert separator multiple footnote symbols cell (#699).

title: flextable 0.9.11
text: PDF/LaTeX: table row whose content taller page split across pages (#548). fundamental constraint LaTeX’s longtable environment, supports page breaks rows, within single row. HTML Word outputs affected.

title: flextable 0.9.11
text: Strings metrics now computed gdtools::strings_sizes() instead m_str_extents() str_metrics(), goal let ‘gdtools’ use ‘systemfonts’ simplified.

title: flextable 0.9.11
text: images google docs now sized expected specifying word_style paragraph style works now. word_style values ignored flextable process ‘rmarkdown’ ‘quarto’. as_flextable.tabulator(): N= counts column headers now displayed multiple grouping columns (previously limited single grouping column). footnote() longer errors row selector matches zero rows (#712). footnote symbols longer clash rotated cells HTML output (#713). PDF/Quarto: fontspec LaTeX package longer included PDF engine pdflatex, fixing compilation errors Quarto documents using pdf-engine: pdflatex (#701, #707). Engine detection now also reads QUARTO_EXECUTE_INFO (Quarto >= 1.8) nested YAML (format > pdf > pdf-engine). inner borders vertically merged cells longer show PDF output background color set (#673). PDF/Quarto: footer repetition longtable part ordering now work correctly default container (none) Quarto output. merge_v(): vertically merged cell labels now appear top merged range PDF/LaTeX output instead bottom (#654). vertical alignment (valign) merged cells now works correctly PDF/LaTeX output rows different heights (#639). Content placed first (top), middle (center), last (bottom) row merged range; \multirow longer used miscalculates offsets unequal row heights. using summarizor() referring two columns, one one unique value longer causes error passed as_flextable().

title: flextable 0.9.10
text: CRAN release: 2025-08-24

title: flextable 0.9.10
text: now possible repeat headers’rows along Word pages using set_table_properties(opts_word = list(repeat_headers = FALSE)).

title: flextable 0.9.10
text: fix format_fun.default works logical columns.

title: flextable 0.9.10
text: print.flextable(preview = "log") use str() show first values data instead print() ggplot2 v4 objects table, print failing.

title: flextable 0.9.9
text: CRAN release: 2025-05-31

title: flextable 0.9.9
text: proc_freq gains new argument count_format_fun let control function format count values.

title: flextable 0.9.9
text: fix compatibility issue rmarkdown::word_document quarto introduced version 0.9.8.

title: flextable 0.9.9
text: Defunct previously deprecated functions as_raster(), lollipop() set_formatter_type(). Definitively forbid usage empty symbol '' footnotes. Users use add_footer_lines() instead.

title: flextable 0.9.8
text: CRAN release: 2025-05-21

title: flextable 0.9.8
text: tab_settings() now using j argument expected (#635) doc inconsistency set_table_properties() layout defaults “fixed”. add_header_row produced error using delete_column() (#676) fmt_signif_after_zeros() fixed issue 0 rounding proc_freq supports now non syntactically names

title: flextable 0.9.7
text: CRAN release: 2024-10-27

title: flextable 0.9.7
text: Added support labelled datasets.

title: flextable 0.9.7
text: fix_border_issues function now useless users, now called automatically printing.

title: flextable 0.9.7
text: fix caption issue came version bookdown (issue #645), ‘bookdown’ management caption simplified. fix vertical overlapping lines grid output (issue #644) fix broken internal links PDF file, probably due change knitr rmarkdown (issue #632) fix right outer border issue grid format (issue #650) fix flextable_to_rmd() issue images pdf (issue #651) fix flextable_to_rmd() issue local chunk eval option (issue #631) proc_freq can now display table percentages without count using include.table_count = FALSE. bring back support ‘pagedown’ pagedown >= 0.20.2 flextable now applies defined text-format empty cells Word Powerpoint outputs.

title: flextable 0.9.6
text: CRAN release: 2024-05-05

title: flextable 0.9.6
text: headers_flextable_at_bkm() footers_flextable_at_bkm() defunct. flextable_to_rmd() now using knit_child() safer usage loops statements. Add explanation caption limitations manual functions save_as_image() ph_with.flextable(). Deprecate as_raster() since gen_grob() easier use render nicer. align(), use old default align argument cause error number columns adjusted multiple 4. documentation specified align single value, actually accept multiple values. default value c("left", "center", "right", "justify"), problematic. documentation now updated new examples included documentation. default align argument now apply left alignment columns body. user specifies alignment invalid, error displayed. path argument now signature part = c("body", "header",     "footer", ""), single value can selected, pick "body" default, . Deprecate lollipop() since produces (ugly) results can replaced nice results gg_chunk() grid_chunk().

title: flextable 0.9.6
text: fix issue as_image() table contains text. fix font instruction issue PDF quarto fix issue Quarto detection R > 4.4 fix align() issue recycling update documentation wrong argument align vectorized columns.

title: flextable 0.9.5
text: CRAN release: 2024-03-06

title: flextable 0.9.5
text: new functions tab_settings() set tabulation marks configuration Word RTF. works officer::fp_tabs(). new function fmt_signif_after_zero() round significant figures zeros.

title: flextable 0.9.5
text: summarizor() don’t stop anymore table contain discrete columns. as_flextable.data.frame() supports ‘data.table’ footnote() handle undefined ref_symbols argument delete_rows() delete rows row selection empty improve gen_grob() alignments wrapping text fix horizontal border issue gen_grob() cells vertically merged Word captions set set_caption() can bookmark autonumber used together.

title: flextable 0.9.5
text: default tabcolsep now set 2. Deprecate set_formatter_type(). renovate fmt_2stats() uses global flextable settings, .e. digits, etc. refactoring data structure content footer along pages PDF now deactivated default. can activated command set_table_properties(opts_pdf = list(footer_repeat = TRUE)). argument checkings as_chunk()

title: flextable 0.9.4
text: CRAN release: 2023-10-22

title: flextable 0.9.4
text: ph_with.flextable() formats widths heights correctly. move image shown add_footer footnote . update documentation automatically change alignment ‘justify’ ‘left’ latex output. borders’width grid output fixed

title: flextable 0.9.4
text: new functions delete_columns() delete_rows() let users delete rows columns. save_as_image() now supports svg export ‘svglite’.

title: flextable 0.9.3
text: CRAN release: 2023-09-07

title: flextable 0.9.3
text: empty argument meaning ‘grouping,’ ability users select numeric statistics display (“mean_sd,” “median_iqr,” “range”), option specify whether show NA counts.

title: flextable 0.9.3
text: as_flextable.data.frame() always shows number rows even less 10 (need !).

title: flextable 0.9.3
text: Make sure ‘gfm’ format rendered image. adviced Ben Bolker, functions as_flextable.lm(), as_flextable.gam(), as_flextable.glm(), as_flextable.merMod() as_flextable.htest() now respect global value getOption("show.signif.stars"). new argument add.random as_flextable.merMod() let add random effects final table. drop superfluous semicolons include.row_percent = FALSE Super subscripts now correctly rendered PDF (thanks Philippe Grosjean). argument max_iter function fit_to_width ignored anymore.

title: flextable 0.9.3
text: rename technical column part .part column named part can used.

title: flextable 0.9.2
text: CRAN release: 2023-06-18

title: flextable 0.9.2
text: rmarkdown expect list dependencies unnamed. property used HTML LaTeX deps resolution know recursive dim_pretty() returns correct numbers ‘inches’ as_flextable.table() now propagates ... expected pdf: table two pages, duplicated caption entries, fixed thanks Christophe Dervieux Nick Bart. Repeating caption along pages can desactivated command set_table_properties(opts_pdf = list(caption_repeat = FALSE)). as_flextable() now works tabular objects R < 4.1. to_html(type = "img") now use correct width height

title: flextable 0.9.2
text: bookdown now bookmarks associated captions flextable benefits feature. ‘Quarto’ captions ignored, make Quarto captions valid HTML PDF outputs; responsibility managing captions lies Quarto framework . work Quarto Word possible Quarto 1.4. as_flextable.tabular() now generate tabulated content sub group contains single row. possible, row titles tabulated.

title: flextable 0.9.2
text: functions footers_flextable_at_bkm headers_flextable_at_bkm deprecated. Instead, recommend using prop_section() block_list() functions officer package alternative solutions. functions provide reliable flexible options managing footers headers.

title: flextable 0.9.1
text: CRAN release: 2023-04-02

title: flextable 0.9.1
text: parameter keepnext ft.keepnext defunct, replaced function paginate() enable nice pagination tables across pages keep_with_next() get total control rows pagination.

title: flextable 0.9.1
text: add RTF support captions. set_flextable_defaults() gains parameter pct_digits (number digits percentages) used relevant functions (proc_freq() now). new method as_flextable.table(). new functions fmt_dbl(), fmt_int() fmt_pct(). Support Word RTF pagination function paginate()

title: flextable 0.9.1
text: refactor proc_freq support 1d frequency table

title: flextable 0.9.1
text: colname type now possible using tabulator(). value html dependancies parameter list html-dep expected. solves issue blogdown pkgdown introduced previous version. fix save_as_html() ugly default title. fix alignment issues rows horizontally merged PDF

title: flextable 0.9.0
text: CRAN release: 2023-03-13

title: flextable 0.9.0
text: add RTF support captions. enable new labels set_header_labels() simple un-named vector. function set_formatter() now accepts single function applied columns. HTML output now can capture google fonts installed gdtools::register_gfont(). refactor save_as_html(): use rmarkdown add google fonts possible (See gdtools::register_gfont()).

title: flextable 0.9.0
text: fix as_flextable.tabular(spread_first_col=TRUE)

title: flextable 0.8.6
text: CRAN release: 2023-02-23 short: RTF support, revealjs support, preserve aspects within Quarto html format use grid graphics saving png (need “webshot” “webshot2” packages) support tables::tabular(): “Computes table summary statistics, cross-classified various variables”

title: flextable 0.8.6
text: add RTF support officer::rtf_add(). new convert tables::tabular() flextable new function as_flextable.tabular(). add to_html.flextable() make easy embedding flextable results HTML (‘ggiraph’ example). add global setting border.width (see ?set_flextable_defaults()) set default value .75, setting used theme functions. old default value hard coded 1 can defined whole R session set_flextable_defaults(border.width = 1).

title: flextable 0.8.6
text: drop ‘base64enc’ dependency use ‘officer’ functions replacement. Use officer_url_encode() encode URL office files. refactor knit_print.flextable() related functions. drop webshot dependency produce images, now using package ‘ragg’. refactor captions: knitr context now updates caption instead managing caption value defined knitr options. use shadow HTML output generated via knitr (.e. ‘Quarto’ ‘R Markdown’).

title: flextable 0.8.6
text: support revealjs (probably RMD formats generate HTML) fix cell’s vertical alignments latex fix detection non transparent background table latex correct lines instructions (hhlines clines) used. fix headers_flextable_at_bkm() footers_flextable_at_bkm()

title: flextable 0.8.5
text: CRAN release: 2023-01-29

title: flextable 0.8.5
text: use pkgdown features instead images shots manual examples. website now shows flextable results.

title: flextable 0.8.5
text: fix issue flextable_to_rmd pdf introduced 0.8.4. fix caption issue Word body_add_flextable().

title: flextable 0.8.4
text: CRAN release: 2023-01-21

title: flextable 0.8.4
text: new argument expand_single as_flextable.tabulator(). FALSE, groups one row expanded title row. argument labels labelizor() now support functions addition named vectors. .character() now returns HTML string table new method as_flextable data.frame using df_printer() function implementation.

title: flextable 0.8.4
text: fix mis-calculated columns widths latex fix horizontal lines latex tables adapt latex table container quarto changes Word caption: autonumber works without bookmark

title: flextable 0.8.3
text: CRAN release: 2022-11-06

title: flextable 0.8.3
text: new argument expand_single as_grouped_data(). FALSE, groups one row expanded title row. new functions fmt_avg_dev(), fmt_header_n(), fmt_n_percent() renaming fmt_2stats() fmt_summarizor() help working tabulator(). tabulator() also new internal values allow N=xxx notes automatic labels. function set_table_properties() now recommanded way set arguments related format options alignment document. supposed replace “knitr” chunk options ft.align, ft.split, ft.keepnext, ft.tabcolsep, ft.arraystretch, ft.latex.float, ft.shadow, fonts_ignore although still supported. allows less interaction ‘R Markdown’ ‘Quarto’ eco-system let define globally set_flextable_defaults(). HTML scrolling can activated calling set_table_properties() providing scroll value argument opts_html: opts_html = list(scroll = list(height = "500px",freeze_first_column = TRUE)). new function grid_chunk() let users add grid graphics functions add_header_row(), add_footer_row(), add_body_row(), add_header_lines() add_footer_lines() now supports formatted paragraph made as_paragraph(). captions: support simple text addition as_paragraph() summarizor() can now transformed directly flextable method as_flextable().

title: flextable 0.8.3
text: fix issue keepnext body_add_flextable() fix issue misordered chunks prepend_chunks() argument ‘unit’ dropped line_spacing() expected ratio

title: flextable 0.8.3
text: ft.keepnext now default FALSE lot users issues option. function xtable_to_flextable() removed (use as_flextable())

title: flextable 0.8.2
text: CRAN release: 2022-09-26

title: flextable 0.8.2
text: prevent docx captions test pandoc version “2.9.2.1” (CRAN Flavor r-devel-linux-x86_64-fedora-gcc).

title: flextable 0.8.1
text: CRAN release: 2022-09-19

title: flextable 0.8.1
text: fix warning subscript superscript #456 prevent usage gregexec R < 4.1 fix rdocx captions

title: flextable 0.8.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-09-11

title: flextable 0.8.0
text: flextable now supports “Grid graphics” output format. See gen_grob(). labelizor() new function help change text labels. add support paragraph settings (made fp_par()) captions set_caption(). captions now made as_paragraph() caption alignments keep_with_next now computed instead provided user alternative text Word tables word_title word_description calling set_table_properties() setting values knitr chunk options tab.alt.title tab.alt.description. Word HTML captions paragraphs settings can defined using set_caption(). alignment paragraph can different alignment table argument align_with_table=FALSE. new theme ‘APA’, theme_apa (@rempsyc #426) method as_flextable.tabulator() gains argument spread_first_col enable spreading first column table line separator. fix doc links functions packages future releases

title: flextable 0.8.0
text: fix caption issue resulting clash variable name ‘n’ (#443) Quarto support fix as_grouped_data() date columns (#438) fix footnotes spread separate lines ‘inline’ (#442) fix missing caption rmarkdown pdf output fix first horizontal borders repeated issue Word output add empty paragraphs tables save_as_docx() avoid Word confusion fix fortify_width() calculation

title: flextable 0.7.3
text: CRAN release: 2022-08-09

title: flextable 0.7.3
text: function as_flextable.tabulator() gained argument label_rows used labels display first column names, .e. row column names. new function shift_table() produce Shift Tables used used clinical trial analysis ready used tabulator(). as_image() don’t need anymore parameters width height package ‘magick’ available.

title: flextable 0.7.3
text: plot.flextable now default grid Graphics. produce plot object can used packages ‘ggplot2’, ‘patchwork’ ‘cowplot’. raster version made ‘webshot’ ‘magick’ pachages still available, use plot(..., method = "webshot").

title: flextable 0.7.3
text: fix top borders correction (docx pptx) check used colors contain NA fix HTML scrolling always visible Windows users fix “cs.family”, “hansi.family” “eastasia.family” Word fix anti-selectors bg/color/highlight, regression version 0.7.2 HTML layout “autofit”, output width set width defined 0 avoid unnecessary word breaks (#429).

title: flextable 0.7.3
text: pptx output constructed top bottom margins whose value top bottom padding paragraph borders copies rendering. add visual tests doconv footnote can used “” symbols, use add_footer_lines() instead.

title: flextable 0.7.2
text: CRAN release: 2022-06-12

title: flextable 0.7.2
text: fix selector issue numeric values (#409)

title: flextable 0.7.1
text: CRAN release: 2022-06-01

title: flextable 0.7.1
text: function as_flextable() now methods lm, glm, models package ‘lme’ ‘lme4’, htest (t.test, chisq.test, …), gam, kmeans pam. new function use_model_printer() set model automatic printing flextable R Markdown document. new function add_body_row() add row body part eventually merged/spanned columns. new function tabulator_colnames() get column names tabulator object. new function prepend_chunks() prepend chunks content flextable cells as_paragraph() without replacing whole content. addition chunk function as_word_field() let add ‘Word’ computed values flextable, as_word_field(x = "Page") page number. new function separate_header() Separate collapsed colnames multiple rows. Functions autofit() dim_pretty() now support newlines. autofit() dim_pretty() now argument hspans help specify horizontally spanned cells affect results. PDF output now supports various floating placement options knitr option ft.latex.float, supported values ‘none’ (default value), ‘float’, ‘wrap-r’, ‘wrap-l’, ‘wrap-’ ‘wrap-o’. HTML output now scrool bar width fit container. can switch using knitr option ft.htmlscroll = FALSE. tabulator() can display columns columns displayed aggregations.

title: flextable 0.7.1
text: fix append_chunks usage adding , j part end function arguments, .... add forgotten supp_data result table tabulator() merged horizontal borders now visible PowerPoint (#378) PowerPoint ‘soft returns’ now real ‘soft returns’. (#379) mapping argument j source color function (bg(), highlight() color()) now based colnames avoid mistake mapping. #395 Fix issue footnotes forcing rectangular extent selection; thanks Sean Browning fix horizontal vertical alignements rotating paragraphs pptx, docx html outputs links pptx docx transformed anymore. fix handling special characters latex vertically merged cells now wrap text paragraph

title: flextable 0.7.1
text: refactor code pptx docx output

title: flextable 0.7.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-03-06

title: flextable 0.7.0
text: new function append_chunks() append chunks content flextable cells as_paragraph() without replacing whole content. new function tabulator() method as_flextable.tabulator() help creation tables used life science industry. also comes function summarizor() sugar function fmt_2stats(). empty_blanks() gained arguments width users can also set blank columns’ width. pass ... format() function using colformat_num(). makes possible use arguments format(), example colformat_num(drop0trailing = TRUE). add knitr chunk option ft.keepnext parameter keepnext function body_add_flextable() enable Word option ‘keep rows together’, page break within table avoided possible. new function add_latex_dep() manually add flextable latex dependencies knitr session.

title: flextable 0.7.0
text: fix Rd files converted HTML entries invalid width attributes e.g. width=40\%.

title: flextable 0.7.0
text: bookdown context without package officedown, possible keep cross-references provided bookdown provide real Word cross-reference table captions (reference number displayed). ’s using bookdown without package officedown : 1. Word auto-numbering desactivated 2. caption prefix formatting feature.

text: flextable now supports PDF/latex output format. new function highlight() text highlighting color new function set_flextable_defaults() set default formatting properties, .e. default border color, font color, padding, decimal.mark … save_as_docx gained new argument pr_section define page layout section properties, save_as_html can now output single table. colformat_ functions now use default values filter columns irrelevant (.e. colformat_num, numeric values formatted). Also, new colformat_ functions implemented (colformat_date, colformat_datetime colformat_double). new functions plot_chunk gg_chunk add miniplots ggplots flextable
